text: John Michael Montgomery (born 1965) is a singer from the U.S. state of Kentucky. He sings and writes country music. He has been a singer since 1992. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Life's a Dance (1992) * Kickin' it Up (1994) * John Michael Montgomery (1995) * What I Do the Best (1996) * Leave a Mark (1998) * Home to You (1999) * Brand New Me (2000) * Pictures (2002) * Letters from Home (2004) * Time Flies (2008) ;Singles * "I Love the Way You Love Me" (1993) ==Related pages== * List of country musicians from Kentucky ==References== ==Other websites== * The website of John Michael Montgomery Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Kentucky Category:Country musicians Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Warner Bros. Records artists
title: John Michael Montgomery
